title: sundarEshvarA
sahitya:
sundarEshvarA nIyE tuNai dayAkarA purahara


anupallavi

  candra shEkharA sakala carAcara nAyaka mInAkSi


caraNam    AlavAi amarndaNanta lIlaigaL purindavA Adi antamEdu maTra
jyOti vaDivamAyava AlaDi ezhundaruLum sadguru nI en ammaiyappan nI
hAlamuNDu aNDa piNDam ANDavanum nI SOma
